CustomField.defaultValue: 'In addition, [DEFENDANT NAME] was issued citation and penalty assessment [CITATION NUMBER] in the amount of $[AMOUNT] for failing to pay minimum wage for all hours worked as required by Labor Code section 1197. Citation [CITATION NUMBER] included an assessment for the unpaid minimum wages in the amount of $[AMOUNT]. This citation was entered as judgment on [JUDGMENT DATE] and remains wholly unsatisfied. Since entry of judgment, interest has accrued at the legal rate and the amount currently owed is $[AMOUNT].'
CustomField.label: WCA 115 In addition Paragraph
